thread.title_full: Rome trip - Review of A.Roma Lifestyle Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Phil S
title: Rome trip
text:
Hotel brilliant staff brilliant overall trip fantastic .would recommend the hotel & room hotel is approx 20 minutes out of centre with a tram ride in to centre tram runs until 12 midnight every day with regular time slots tickets are only 1euro 50 so cheap we went for 2.5 days you need longer so we are going again
Room Tip: Room was excellent See more room tips
